identity.name: E1 Smart Home
identity.description: A fusion of soft utility and vibrant energy. Dark mode first, with glowing, friendly accents that make controlling the home feel like magic, not admin.
principles: Fusion: Soft rounded UI meets sharp neon accents
Emotion: Color = Room Mood (Warm for living, Cool for bath)
Content: Controls are big, touch-friendly, and satisfying
Depth: Glassmorphism layers to separate control planes

mono.usage: Sensor data, IP addresses, technical details

sidebar.desktop: fixed left-0 top-0 h-full w-64 border-r border-border/10 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-xl z-50
sidebar.mobile: fixed bottom-0 left-0 w-full h-16 border-t border-border/10 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-xl z-50 flex justify-around items-center

room_card.style: rounded-3xl border border-white/5 bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md overflow-hidden relative group transition-all duration-300 hover:border-white/10

elements.icon: text-2xl p-3 rounded-2xl bg-white/5 mb-4 w-fit
elements.title: text-xl font-bold tracking-tight

control_slider.track: h-12 rounded-full bg-secondary relative overflow-hidden cursor-pointer
control_slider.fill: h-full absolute left-0 top-0 transition-all duration-100 ease-out

glass_panel.base: bg-black/20 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-3xl shadow-2xl

setup: Configure Tailwind theme to include the custom colors defined in 'colors.palette'
implementation_rules: Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout: Use CSS Grid with varying col-spans.
Ensure touch targets are at least 44px for all controls.
Use the 'glass_panel' style for the main navigation and overlays.
For the 'Energy Monitoring' chart, use a Recharts AreaChart with a gradient fill.
The 'Theme Toggle' must persist state to localStorage.
Mock data should be rich and realistic (e.g., 'Living Room Temp: 22Â°C', 'Kitchen Light: On').
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic gradients. Use the specific 'gradients' defined above.
Ensure high contrast for text, even in dark mode.
